segments.text: They've got their eye on the cookie jar, that's for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined, stretching up on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's already got one hand in the jar, probably grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's outstretched hand shows her eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing similar things when I was young.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks incredibly unstable, almost about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It would be a shame for their cookie heist to end in disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, their ingenuity to get those cookies is quite impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are perfectly coordinating their efforts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a risky but rewarding mission for a child.
segments.speaker: PAR
